entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Syntax_Provider_Doesnt_Attribute_Incorrect_Timing flaky on MacOS #61474
  • Null Reference while accessing GlobalOptionService #61473
  • Move Static Members to another type overwrites existing file and code #61471
  • Adjust implementation of user-defined conversion resolution according to the latest LDM decision #61470
  • Convert switch statement to expression - incorrect 'OR' operator for fallthrough options #61468
  • Issue with "Avoid expression statements that implicitly ignore value" code style fixer #61467
  • In Intellisense, Parameter Descriptions Set to inheritdoc Concatenate Together #61466
  • Refactoring namespace removes this operator #61465
  • Add TargetFramework.Net70 with "numeric IntPtr" support #61463
    C# 11.0
  • Creating a value tuple with a non-existent field results in a confusing CS8619 #61462
  • Disallow an interface containing or inheriting static abstract/virtual members as a type argument #61461
    C# 11.0
  • .editorconfig ignored when EnableDefaultItems = false #61458
  • Workspace failed with could not load "NuGet.Frameworks" error #61454

Closed

  • Disallow interfaces with abstract statics as type arguments #60606
    C# 11.0
  • [17.1.5] Improvements to the new "Base types/implemented interfaces" view ("inheritance margin"?) #61022
    Backlog
  • Confirm whether we would like to support use of static abstract methods declared in interfaces as operators in query expressions #53796
    C# 11.0
  • Implement LSP breakpoint placement request #59455
    17.3
  • Unable to add configuration item #61459
  • Peek Definition does not work with decompiled sources #23480
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix null ref for JS files #61472
    Area-IDE
  • Lazily produce semantic models in source generators #61469
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61460
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Update test to reflect enum behavior change #61456
    Area-Compilers
  • Update test to reflect new GetPublicKeyToken API behavior #61455
    Test

Merged

  • Remove unnecessary finalizer state handling from MethodToStateMachine… #61409
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to features/required-members #61447
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Update status for DIM and numeric IntPtr #61464
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Update SDK to .NET 7 Preview 4 #61422
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Allow source link, embedded or decompiled source in Peek Definition #61427
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Merge main to features/semantic-snippets #61475
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Lifted relational operator implies operands non-null when true #61403
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Nullable Reference Types
  • Add file paths to interactive buffers and documents to support LSP requests #61441
    Area-IDE, Area-Interactive, LSP
  • Mask count in shift operations on native integers #61341
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Adjust conversion from nuint to float/double #61345
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Support 'scoped' modifier for parameters and locals #61389
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Support declaring and binding to methods with `params Span<T>` #59123
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC: Allow adding/removing await expressions and yield statements #61356
    Area-Compilers, 17.3
  • Add helper for source generators to filter to nodes with attribute matching an attribute name #61293
    Area-Compilers
  • [semi-auto-props]: Rename ContainsFieldKeyword, revise cases that should handle FieldKeywordBackingField #61310
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Address prototype comments #61436
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Required Members
  • Safely create VirtualCharSequence from string in StackFrameParser #59283
    Area-IDE
  • Bind native integers in cref #61431
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove parameter nullchecking feature #61397
    Area-Compilers
  • Add telemetry dump of Options #61373
    Need Design Review
  • Log additional information from CopyRefAssembly #61384
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow creating SourceText from a StringBuilder #61251
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Enable CA1822 (make static) #61453
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/semi-auto-props #61448
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Synthesize a method that throws when a method is deleted in EnC [Alternate] #61160
    Area-Compilers
  • Add new background analysis scope option for compiler diagnostics #60808
    Area-Analyzers
